definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Bu
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
afternoon/CL:個|个[ge4]/p.m.
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
to fall/to tumble

to come down/(completed action marker)/(after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.)/(indicates continuation from the past towards us)/to be harvested (of crops)/to be over (of a period of time)/to go among the masses (said of leaders)
to leave behind/to stay behind/to remain/to keep/not to let (sb) go
to go down/to descend/to go on/to continue/(of a servant) to withdraw
under/beneath/less than
below/under/next/the following/also pr. [xia4 mian5]
to boil noodles
underground/subterranean/covert
to accept/to take/next/following
as follows
up and down/top and bottom/old and new/length/about

sentences.english: They climb walls, leap off buildings and spy on enemies.
sentences.chinese: 它們會爬牆，能跳下大樓，還能暗中監視敵人。

sentences.english: I don't want to lonely sitting recalled miss, take up, put down.
sentences.chinese: 我不想孤單坐在回憶了思念，拿得起，放得下。

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 測定了龍竹竹材在不同熱壓溫度下乾燥時的溫度分佈。

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩下到馬達加斯加南部的一個藍寶石礦裏。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 總之，只要讓我在第戎下火車就行。

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 計算分析了某渦輪泵轉子在彈性支承下的臨界轉速。

sentences.english: Unplug the jack carefully examined, D-type socket pin bends whether or Broken Needle?
sentences.chinese: 拔下插口仔細檢查，D型插口中是否有彎針或斷針？

sentences.english: The sun blistered the paint on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 在陽光下牆上的油漆起氣泡了。

sentences.english: So I decided to test the system.
sentences.chinese: 因此我決定測試下這個制度。

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 檢查明確鎖骨下動脈狹窄的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: The paper studied 7 case Masked civet of dystocia in farm condition.
sentences.chinese: 本文對7例在養殖條件下難產的花面狸進行了研究。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: Each day I live, the grace you give.
sentences.chinese: 每天的生活，禰都賜下恩典。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲是在這種情況下，國際援助和監督才很重要。

definition: under/beneath/less than
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
aim/clear
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
really and truly
see 的士[di1 shi4]
background/backdrop/context/(fig.) powerful backer/CL:種|种[zhong3]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
surname Ye

to come down/(completed action marker)/(after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.)/(indicates continuation from the past towards us)/to be harvested (of crops)/to be over (of a period of time)/to go among the masses (said of leaders)
final/last/finally/ultimate
hereto/here
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
surname Hou
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
